org.escoladeltreball.ulisesmap.connections

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
      • org.escoladeltreball.ulisesmap.connections.Client

  • public class Client
extends
    Client Class communicates with multiple servlets. Each servlet sends and receives specific information. There are 12 servlets. Some information is sent string in JSON format depend on the servlet.

    • Field Detail

      • SERVLET_INSERT_USER

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_INSERT_USER
        This servlet inserts the users database. Client sends a user in JSON format and servlet responds if the user has inserted or not. The JSON has name, password and email of user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_CHECK_USER

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_CHECK_USER
        This servlet check if exist a user or not. Client sends a user in JSON format and servlet responds if the user exist or not. The JSON has name and password of user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_ROUTES

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_ROUTES
        This servlet get routes. Client send reference of route and servlet responds string with format JSONArray. The JSONArray has name, description, image and average of routes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_POINTS_OF_ROUTE

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_POINTS_OF_ROUTE
        This servlet get points of routes. Client send name route and servlet response string with format JSONArray. The JSONArray has name, latitude, longitude, street, description, url and image of points.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_POINT

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_POINT
        This servlet get point. Client send reference of points and servlet responds string with format JSONArray. The JSONArray has name, latitude, longitude, street, description, url, and image of points.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_COMMENT_AND_VALORATION

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_COMMENT_AND_VALORATION
        This servlet get comment and valoration. Client send name of route and servlet responds string with format JSONArray. The JSONArray has comment and valoration and for each comment or valoration has definition and user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_COMMENT_INSERT

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_COMMENT_INSERT
        This servlet insert the comment database. Client send a comment in JSON format and servlet responds if the comment has inserted or not. The JSON has definition, user and route.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_CHECK_COMMENT

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_CHECK_COMMENT
        This servlet check if exist a comment of user or not. Client send in JSON format and servlet responds if the comment of user exist or not. The JSON has name of route and name of user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_VALORATION_INSERT

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_VALORATION_INSERT
        This servlet insert the valoration database. Client send a comment in JSON format and servlet responds if the valoration has inserted or not. The JSON has value ranking, user and route.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_CHECK_VALORATION

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_CHECK_VALORATION
        This servlet check if exist a valoration of user or not. Client send in JSON format and servlet responds if the valoration of user exist or not. The JSON has name of route and name of user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_COUNTRIES

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_COUNTRIES
        This servlet get all countries database. Client not send nothing and servlet responds string with format JSONArray. The JSONArray has name of country.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVLET_CITIES

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_CITIES
        This servlet get all cities of countries database. Client send name of country and servlet responds string with format JSONArray. The JSONArray has name of city.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRUE_CHECK

        public static final java.lang.String TRUE_CHECK
        Answer when the request of servlet has gone well.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FALSE_CHECK

        public static final java.lang.String FALSE_CHECK
        Answer when the request of servlet hasn't gone well.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String nameServlet,
      boolean sendMessage)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        nameServlet - name of servlet. Name of servlet is default value for a variable published.
        sendMessage - true if client has to send a message or false if client hasn't to send message
